title: Work done by field to move object from A to B

content.question: When an object is moved from rest at point A to rest at point B in a gravitational field, the net work done by the field depends on the mass of the object and

choices.label: the positions of A and B only
the path taken between A and B only
both the positions of A and B and the path taken between them
the velocity of the object as it moves between A and B
the nature of the external force moving the object from A and B

content.answer: the positions of A and B only

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
